content: I love fishing! Catch it, toss it back. Catch it again, toss it back again. The best part? Just keep reeling them in and letting them go, bhan-bhan!
info: 闲聊-日常特殊反馈-正在执行的动作-NPC正在钓鱼-0保底_新特殊反馈

content: The best part isn't when you actually catch the fish. It's watching them swim around the bait. I just can't get enough of it! Bhan!
info: 闲聊-日常特殊反馈-正在执行的动作-NPC正在钓鱼-0保底_新特殊反馈
